explanation: [0-0] A dark-skinned man stands on a green lawn with buildings visible behind him. He holds a blue comb in front of his face, covering half of it. Above the image, black subtitles read: "Name this hairstyle," along with a finger pointing down emoji.

[0-4] The man moves the comb away from his face, revealing his face and blonde hair. He combs his hair, moving the comb upwards from his scalp to make it stand up. The scene then switches to a room where a man in a white T-shirt sits at a black table eating instant noodles from a cup. A woman with long hair sits next to him, looking down at her phone.

[4-14] The man in white slurps the noodles. The woman turns to look at him, then back at her phone, and then back at the man again, covering her mouth with her right hand. She then pats her chest and runs off to the right in terror. The man in white looks at her with a puzzled expression and then continues eating his noodles with a smile.
